headline: Cantor Fitzgerald Upgrades HCA Healthcare, Inc.’s (HCA) Price Target, Citing Strategic Strengths
summary: Cantor Fitzgerald elevated HCA Healthcare, Inc.’s (NYSE:HCA) price target to $444 from $405 on May 21, 2025, reaffirming an Overweight rating. The adjustment arises from to analyst’s confidence in the healthcare giant’s operational resilience and growth trajectory and reflects a 16% potential upside from the stock’s current closing price of $381.81. HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), […]
